welcome_text: This is a little info we'll show to the user only on his first visit.
infotext: hellohello effort to document predictions about the future and their realisations. Everyone is invited to contribute content and correct errors. The Dystopia Tracker was build by David Bauer in collaboration with Journalism++, with support of the Augstein Stiftung.
license_bold: All content from this site can be reused free of charge
license_rest: (please do so!). It's licenced under a BY-SA Creative Commons Licence. You can embed filtered views (e.g. everything by George Orwell) or any single prediction with its realisations. All content is available via a read API (see documentation). Whatever you build, please encourage your users to contribute content themselves, and let us know about what you created.
form_infotext: Here we put a short info text that helps the user understand what exactly we're looking for. Shown only on his first visit of the form.
Title: Titel
form_source-infotext: Wir haben diesen Titel noch nicht in unserer Datenbank. Bitte geben sie uns weitere Angaben dazu.
Author: Autor
Enter the prediction. Try to be specific: Beschreiben Sie die Vorhersage möglichst genau.
What year: Für welches Jahr wurde die Vorhersage gemacht? Bitte nur angeben, wenn genaues Jahr bekannt.
more info where: Wo gibt es weitere Informationen zur Vorhersage?
Pick a category for your prediction: Ordnen Sie die Vorhersage einer Kategorie zu.
Your name or initials (so we can send al: Ihr Name oder Initialen (Ehre, wem Ehre gebührt
Bummer, no content: Leider gibt es noch keine Vorhersagen für diese Auswahl. Das muss aber nicht so bleiben, der Ball ist bei Ihnen:
Describe the realisation. What exactly has been realised?
Where can we find more info on the reali: Where can we find more info on the realisation?
for adding this prediction. Want to shar: for adding this prediction. Want to share it?
It doesn't need to stop just now. Here's what you can do next. Has your prediction already become reality in some way?
Or do you know of some more predictions: Or do you know of some more predictions you'd like to share?
so I can see what others have submitted: so I can see what others have submitted
Thank you for your translation. The inte: Danke für Übersetzung. Das Internet sagt Danke.
